biotools.summary: Fit-Hi-C (FitHiC) is a Python tool for assigning statistical confidence estimates to chromosomal contact maps produced by genome-wide genome architecture assays such as Hi-C.

bioschemas.name: FitHiC
bioschemas.summary: Fit-Hi-C (FitHiC) is a Python tool for assigning statistical confidence estimates to chromosomal contact maps produced by genome-wide genome architecture assays such as Hi-C.
